doc:
John D'Aquino https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_D%27Aquino 0 John D'Aquino is an American film and television actor, best known for his role as Lieutenant Benjamin Krieg in seaQuest DSV, Joel in the film Pumpkinhead and U.S. President Richard Martinez in the Disney Channel Original Series Cory in the House. In 1985 he co-starred with William Smith, Howard Rollins, Meg Ryan and Terry Funk as Varges de la Cosa in the western series Wildside on ABC. He has made guest appearances on Baywatch, Matlock, Melrose Place, Murder, She Wrote, Seinfeld, Sliders, Quantum Leap, Xena: Warrior Princess, Crossing Jordan, Hannah Montana, Monk, Shake It Up, Lois and Clark: The New Adventures of Superman and had recurring roles on 3rd Rock from the Sun, JAG, and co-starred in Comedy Central's That's My Bush! as Larry O'Shea. John_D'Aquino is an_American_film_and_television_actor , best_known for his_role as Lieutenant_Benjamin_Krieg in seaQuest_DSV , Joel in the_film Pumpkinhead_and_U.S._President_Richard_Martinez in the_Disney_Channel_Original_Series_Cory in the_House . In 1985 he co-starred with William_Smith , Howard_Rollins , Meg_Ryan and Terry_Funk as Varges_de_la_Cosa in the_western_series_Wildside on ABC . He has_made guest_appearances on Baywatch , Matlock , Melrose_Place , Murder , She Wrote , Seinfeld , Sliders , Quantum_Leap , Xena : Warrior_Princess , Crossing_Jordan , Hannah_Montana , Monk , Shake It Up , Lois and Clark : The_New_Adventures of Superman and had_recurring roles on 3rd_Rock from the_Sun_,_JAG , and co-starred in Comedy_Central 's_That 's My_Bush ! as Larry_O'Shea .
